head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CROOKHORN, HENRY M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CROOKHORN, HENRY M.

block.p: CROOKHORN-Henry M. Born on February 1, 1912. Died August 20, 2000. Lifelong resident of Manhattan. Devoted husband of Evelyn nee Rundblad. Loving uncle of Edmund W. Cherished great-uncle of Michael, Erin and Alyssa. Former 47-year employee of NY Telephone Company. WW II veteran, Master Sergeant, Europe Theater, awarded Croix de Guerre medal. Visitation Tueday, 2-5, 7-9, Dimiceli & Sons Funeral Home, 182 Lexington Ave., NYC. Interment Wednesday 11 AM, St. John's Cemetery.
